info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 6:31PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rabun and west central Oconee Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clayton, or near Tiger, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clayton, Tiger, Lake Rabun, Lakemont, Mountain City, Black Rock Mountain State Park, Tallulah Falls, Seed Lake and Long Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
